buginformation.summary: Support enable cache_data_on_write in Shell while creating table
buginformation.description: A simple approach to support cache_data_on_write while creating table in shell.

buginformation.summary: Fix a couple of incorrect anchors in HBase ref guide
buginformation.description: From HBASE-15298:After this patch is applied, there are still two missing asciidoc anchors, distributed.log.splitting and fail.fast.expired.active.master. These are related to features removed by HBASE-14053 and HBASE-10569. I think these anchors(and related texts) should be handled by someone who knows those issues well, so I retain them.
